meanings.definition: The state of being secret or hidden.
meanings.sent1: The clandestinity of the surprise party was ruined when the birthday girl found out.
meanings.sent2: The spy's success relied on the clandestinity of his operations.
meanings.sent3: The clandestinity of the ninja's hiding spot made him bump into a wall.
meanings.sent4: The clandestinity of the treasure chest was finally revealed by the curious explorer.
meanings.sent5: The clandestinity of the magician's trick left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality of being concealed or kept secret.
meanings.sent1: The clandestinity of the hidden passage was discovered by the detective.
meanings.sent2: The clandestinity of the confidential documents was crucial for national security.
meanings.sent3: The clandestinity of the squirrel's stash of acorns made it a mystery to the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The clandestinity of the thief's identity kept the police guessing.
meanings.sent5: The clandestinity of the ancient artifact added to its allure.
